Questions.question: How much does it cost to set up a store?
Questions.answer: The cost of setting of a store can vary depending on the platform and the features you require. Many e-commerce platforms offer both free and paid plans, with additional costs for custimoizarions and add-ons.

Questions.question: What kind of digital products can I sell?
Questions.answer: You can sell wide range of digital products, including e-books, software, music, videos, courses, and more. The possiblities are virtually endless, as long as the product can be delivered digitally

Questions.question: Do I need techanical skills to use the platform?
Questions.answer: The level of techanical skills required depends on the platfrom you choose. Some e-commerce platforms are designed to be user-friendly and require no techanical skills, while others may require some techincal knowledge for setup and customization.

Questions.question: Is there a limit to the number of products I can list?
Questions.answer: The limit to the number fo products you can list also depends on the platform. Some platforms have a maximum number of products allowed on their plans. while others offer unlimited listings.

Questions.question: How do I receive payments for my sales?
Questions.answer: Most e-commerce offer multiple payment options, including credit/debit cards, PayPal, and other payment gateways, You can choose the payment methods that best suits your customers.

Questions.question: Can I sell internationally on this marketplace?
Questions.answer: Yes, absolutely! Our marketplace supports international selling, allowing you to reach customers worldwide.

Questions.question: What support and resources are available for sellers?
Questions.answer: We provide extensive support and resources for sellers, including tutorials, guides, and dedicated customer support to help you succeed.

Questions.question: Is there a review process for uploaded products?
Questions.answer: Yes, we have a review process in place to encure the quality and integrity of uploaded products. Each product undergoes through review before being made available to customers.
